content: one stitch remove the marker knit round please make sure not to work too and turn long a foot as with this kind of a heel structure work the heel flap back and forth as follows all excess length appears as a baggy heel rather than a long toe row 1 rs sl1 k21 k23 k25 k27 ssk turn switch to larger needles if desired work chart row 2 ws sl1 p21 p23 p25 p27 p2tog s3 m3 l3 xl3 attaching and cutting cc1 turn and cc2 when appropriate each chart row is repeat row 1 and 2 until 4 5 5 6 unworked repeated 10 11 12 13 times in each round stitches remain on each side of the heel flap switch to smaller needles if desired and and you have just finished row 2 there are continue with mc only now 31 35 37 41 sts on the sole side including both the heel flap and side stitches knit until foot measures approximately 4 4 4 5 4 5 cm / 1½ 1½ 1¾ 1¾ inches less than continue working in the round on the rs as the desired final length follows sl1 k21 k23 k25 k27 ssk knit to the end of needle 1 note that in size xl there s one slipped-stitch column on each side toe of the heel flap on needle 1 you can either continue the established slipped- stitch sizes s and l only knit stitches on needle 1 pattern at those points or work the whole sole on needle 2 k1 ssk knit until 3 sts remain in stockinette stitch k2tog k1 knit one round work in the established slipped-stitch pattern there is no need for set-up rnds for sizes m on needle 2 i e the instep on needle 1 i e and xl the sole k3 k4 k4 k5 k2tog and knit to the all sizes end of needle 1 there are now 31 33 35 39 sts on needle 1 and 29 33 37 39 sts on round 1 on needle 1 *k1 ssk knit until 3 sts needle 2 remain k2tog k1* repeat * - * on needle 2 round 2 knit repeat rnds 1 and 2 until 19 21 23 25 sts remain on each needle finishing with round 2 then repeat only round 1 until 9 11 11 13 sts remain on each needle cut the yarn and graft the toe kanteletar socks page 4/9 finishing soak the socks in lukewarm water remove excess water by rolling the socks in a towel dry flat or on sock blockers weave in ends technical tips photo tutorial for the provisional crochet cast on http //www purlsoho com/create/2007/12/10/provisional-cast-on/ photo tutorial for working a folded hem http //www eileencaseycreations com/tutorials/knitted-hem-tutorial/ video tutorial for working left-leaning and right-leaning latvian braids https //www youtube com/watch v=mr9lwsalyjc video tutorial for working shadow wraps on rs and ws row https //www youtube com/watch v=9bc23kdkzmo abbreviations cc 1 2 contrast colour 1 2 k knit
